content: I am a master student of Dynamics & Control Systems studying at Isfahan University of Technology. Currently, I am collaborating with the Advanced Robotics and Mechatronics (ARM) Lab as a graduate research assistant. My research interests include Multi-robot systems, Intelligent Control and Visual Servoing.

title: M. Amin Safavi
